name: HappyRadio
0:
”Alexa, play happy radio”
”Alexa, ask happy radio what is playing”
”Alexa, ask happy radio who's on air now”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy radio
des:
We've selected the greatest classic popular hits from the 60s through the 2000's to make every hour of every day a happy day for you.

The music is streamed by KKHA 92.5 FM from studios in Bay City, Texas, and is live hosted by American announcers.

To start, just say "Alexa, play happy radio", or "Alexa, open happy radio". You can ask Alexa the name of any song by saying "Alexa, ask happy radio what's this song?". And, to stop the stream, simply say "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
